darkMap.title: Map Dark Theme

purple.title: Purple Line Express
purple.purpleEx: Only During weekday rush periods, Purple Line Express trains continue express to downtown
purple.purpleLongEx:
Normally, the purple line only services between Linden and Howard. 

However during weekday rush periods, Purple Line Express trains continue express to downtown via Loop shown by the dashed lines

notes.brown: After leaving Clark/Lake, trains then exit Loop and make all stops from Merchandise Mart back through to Kimball.
notes.pink: After leaving Washington/Wells, trains then exit Loop and make all stops from Clinton back through to 54th/Cermak.
notes.orange: After leaving Adams/Wabash, trains then exit Loop and make all stops from Roosevelt back through to Midway.
notes.purple: After leaving Washington/Wells, Purple Line Express trains then exit Loop and make all stops from Merchandise Mart back through to Linden.

snotes.lake: To connect to other lines, you must transfer to the above ground station State/Lake. Predictions are not shown for those lines here
